message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You're off to a weak start, Alice! I'll give you a chance to improve.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more than last time!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not afraid to take a bigger share now.
You're taking a bigger share, I'm taking a bigger share too!
You're getting closer to the edge, Alice. I'm not budging.
I'm taking a risk, but I think I can get a better deal now!
You're running out of time, Alice. I'm taking control of this negotiation.
I'm going all-in, Bob. This is my last offer!
You're out of options, Alice. I'm taking the last chance to get what I want.
